item.title: Halal Cart-Style Chicken and Tzatziki
item.dc:creator: Matt Anderson
item.description: My roommate has a favorite tzatziki recipe he likes to make. When he told me he was going to make that and nothing else, I decided to help him round out the meal. I made the chicken and rice from Serious Eats' Halal Cart-Style Chicken and Rice with White Sauce and a Tabouli salad. I made the rice with some homemade chicken stock as well. May favorite part of the meal is the chicken. The marinade is really excellent!

item.title: Chicken Katsu Sandwiches
item.dc:creator: Matt Anderson
item.description:
I still have a bunch of coleslaw from the Impromptu BBQ Potluck so my roommate suggested we make spicy chicken katsu sandwiches. The original recipe uses lettuce and a spicy pickle mayo, but I think the coleslaw was even better.

We bought extra thighs for an upcoming meal which I deboned and deskinned. I'll save the bones for chicken stock and the skin for schmaltz.
